review: Pros: Really easy to use, access to tons of online content/apps.Cons: The content delivery is slow and the internet connection drops off every once in a while. Many times, something I am watching through the Fire Stick will start freezing up, so I'll finish watching it on my computer. Given that my computer is in the same room and on the same WiFi network as the stick, it means that the stick itself is causing the connectivity/buffering problem. If this was fixed, it would be a 5 start product. However, as is, it's at best a 3 star if not worse.
author: Kate Dalton

review: I love this thing! This replaced a chromecast I had, I hated that the only way to do anything on my chromecast was always through my phone or tablet, sometimes I just want a remote and an interface so I don't have to get out my tablets and little things like fast forwarding or pausing required more work that just hitting a button on a remote.The interface is great, I don't notice it being slow, I had a couple issues with netflix that I think is a widely known problem but I am sure it will get fixed.Like the chromecast it cannot connect to 5.8Ghz N connections which is kind of a downer as that is my main wireless connection.
